WorkItem.ClosedComment: Thank you for your suggestion, but typescript is designed to closely match the current EcmaScript 5 spec and the proposed EcmaScript 6 spec.
WorkItem.Description:
Hello,

I would like to have the following feature in typescript, ie the ability to automatically substitute variables in strings... I suggest the following ;

the typescript expression : 

"something $myvariable$ somewhere"

woud be translated in javacript into :

﻿﻿﻿"something "+ myvariable+" somewhere"

 

regards

Xavier
